catalog_info.title: Workshop on Mixed Methods of Empirical Analysis
catalog_info.notes: First meetings Friday, September 4, 2015.  The graduate workshop on mixed methods is a forum for graduate students and faculty to present their empirical work-qualitative, quantitative,or mixed-methods-and get feedback on the empirical veracity of theirclaims. Individuals of all methodological persuasions are welcome. We are particularly interested in exploring synergies that can occur across methodological boundaries, either in the context of mixed-methods projects or in the context of collaboration between qualitative and quantitative researchers.
